About Us

Internal facilitates the communication necessary for supremely healthy digital culture, while providing a means for individuals to track their emotional fitness and a finger on the pulse of team sentiment for managers

Benefits

Who knew a simple tool could offer such great benefits?

Innovation

Creativity is the result of a healthy headspace, achieved through self reflection

Comfortability

Understanding the team’s emotional sentiment adds comfort to workplace communication

Motivation

Inspiration comes through authentic emotional knowledge - Gained through Internal

Meditation

Daily reflections help focus the mind on the present and accept all emotional states

Awareness

Get more efficient by internalizing the patterns of what makes you and your team tick

Inclusion

Emotional insights form stronger relationships amongst team members, increasing team cohesion

Install For Free!

Only managers who want access to authentic, aggregate team emotional analytics need to pay, so you're free to download Internal and try it out for yourself - be sure to let us know what you think!

Employees check in for the sake of their team and reflect for the sake of themselves

Internal sends users twice-daily check ups with slightly different queries for each. The first check up is carried out at the beginning of your shift and gauges how you are feeling today in order to inform your coworkers. The rflection check up is taken at the end of the day so that you can track yourself over time.

Both are equally as important, provide equal value, and have the capability of changing how you interact with your team and yourself for the better.

Managers are sent team insights straight to their DM's that allow them to manage better

It's hard to really know your team when close, family-like bonds aren't viewed as professionally appropriate. Without a strong bond, it's nearly impossible to feel comfortable enough around someone to have conversations involving authentic emotion.

Access insights to your team's emotional wellbeing that would only otherwise be uncovered through heart-to-heart bonds that the modern workplace doesn't yet accept.

Frequently Asked Questions

If you don't find an answer here, be sure to contact us - we're happy to help!

  • What is emotional fitness?

    Emotional fitness commonly means the ability to emotionally adapt to any situation. We tend to think of it from a much broader perspective. Emotional fitness to us isn’t a dynamic measure, that defines you and typically holds steady, but is static, reflective of your current emotional state.

  • How can you measure emotions?

    Emotions seem borderline-incomprehensible, but the extent of emotions are not. There is a huge difference between content and ecstatic regardless of the fact that they both fall under the umbrella of "happy". This is what we measure - The degree to which you are feeling an emotion.

  • How do I cancel my subscription?

    In the name of getting the product out to the market as soons as possible, we forwent all things that would slow us down - A log in and customer dashboard being two of them. For now, email support@getinternal.co to cancel your subscription, but in the future you'll be able to carry that out on the site.

  • Do you collect my data?

    We do, indeed, collect the necessary data to compute scores and things of that nature. For more information, feel free to take a glace at our Privacy Policy.

  • Can my manager see what answers I choose?

    Not personally - Team reports aggregate everyone on the team’s logs, meaning no one’s questionnaire choices are personally identifiable.

  • What if I lie on the questionnaire?

    This wouldn’t be helpful to anyone. In the instance that you lie (which, you’d have no reason to do — no one knows your answers but yourself), you don’t get authentic results and reports. That means you can’t accurately track your emotional fitness, and your manager’s concept of where the team’s headspace is at isn’t accurate!

Internal is the emotional nervous system of organizations - A network of emotional tracking and sentiment intelligence tools, created to eradicate professional agony and promote innovation through empathy, transparency, and acceptance.
